title: Lezizel Manti
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Mediterranean, Take-out, Asian, Middle Eastern, Turkish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves freshly made-in-house manti (Turkish dumplings), made-in-house lemonade, bulgur, and desserts. The ones that are green (spinach) are vegan. Plenty of toppings are available, including real truffles. All vegan items are clearly marked.
